title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: download, build and run Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API; chat, generate embeddings and pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving Ollama models first-class support for chat, tools, embeddings and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that turns any local Ollama instance into a ChatGPT-like interface.

title: continue/continue
summary: VS-Code & JetBrains plugin that adds local AI coding assistant; ships with Ollama provider out-of-the-box.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Streamlit app showing how to build RAG with Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot clone that uses Ollama CodeLlama for local autocomplete inside VS-Code.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client written in Python; supports conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that proxies requests to a local Ollama instance; supports group chats and inline queries.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK with async REST client and strongly-typed chat requests.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama models as chat back-end with admin UI and REST endpoints via Django-Rest-Framework.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: Custom n8n node that lets you call Ollama chat or completion endpoints inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate exposing async Ollama APIs using reqwest and tokio.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that adds slash commands to chat with any Ollama model; supports thread isolation.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP wrapper that pools Ollama connections and exposes GenServer interface for Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Drop-in FastAPI micro-service that proxies Ollama endpoints adding JWT auth, request logging and rate limits.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that lets you summarize notes or generate text using local Ollama models.
